item.title: Identifying Programming Languages
item.description: This is the beginning of a series of blog posts focusing on programming language identification in code files Introduction This past summer, as part of work for the CodeCommons (CC) and Software Heritage (SWH) projects, I set out to run a series of tests benchmarking currently existing utilities specializing in identifying programming languages (PL) in code files. In a series of blog posts, I will share my methods, results, and findings.
